channel.title: HeroicScape ~317~ Bringing back Czar..Except.. More stable
channel.description:
So this is a source ive been working on. Im not saying what i used as the base.. for fear of what the flamers will say about it. But lets just say it was created by a guy named ɹɐʇsןןɐ poɯ ^_^ So anyways.. Here goes..
Home: [img]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/9779/evolved0000m.png[/img]
Shops: (they are placed in buildings around home. So these are examples i guess) [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg135/scaled.php?server=135&filename=evolved0001.png&xsize=640&ysize=640[/img]
Train: [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg853/scaled.php?server=853&filename=evolved0003.png&xsize=640&ysize=640[/img]
Vengeance: (Added a better GFX to it^_^) [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg195/scaled.php?server=195&filename=evolved0004n.png&xsize=640&ysize=640[/img]
Lumby: (i dunno if any of u saw that portal at home. but it leads to here) [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg543/scaled.php?server=543&filename=evolved0005.png&xsize=640&ysize=640[/img]
Rares shop: (located in lumby) [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg15/scaled.php?server=15&filename=evolved0006.png&xsize=640&ysize=640[/img]
Skillcape emotes: (kinda =S) [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg849/scaled.php?server=849&filename=evolved0007.png&xsize=640&ysize=640[/img]
Gsmini: [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg228/scaled.php?server=228&filename=evolved0008.png&xsize=640&ysize=640[/img]
Raiding: (This is something ive been working on. Its a raiding feature in RSPS.. Some might think its gay but oh well) [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg714/scaled.php?server=714&filename=evolved0009.png&xsize=640&ysize=640[/img]
Inside the raiding arena: (Monsters get stronger as you advance through) ***Also NPCS FIGHT BACK*** [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg23/scaled.php?server=23&filename=evolved0010i.png&xsize=640&ysize=640[/img]
Pk area: [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg811/scaled.php?server=811&filename=evolved0011y.png&xsize=640&ysize=640[/img]
Farming:
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg215/scaled.php?server=215&filename=evolved0012.png&xsize=640&ysize=640[/img]
Skills: (Still deciding whether or not to change this.. let me know?)
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg202/scaled.php?server=202&filename=evolved0013.png&xsize=640&ysize=640[/img]
Mining:
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg269/scaled.php?server=269&filename=evolved0014.png&xsize=640&ysize=640[/img]
Commands: (In Quest Tab) **Cliche.. Im aware;)***
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg594/scaled.php?server=594&filename=evolved0015.png&xsize=640&ysize=640[/img]
Well thats it.. So let me know how it looks? I know czar is outdated and all the new rsps ppl will hate this. But u gotta love the classics. So just let me know how it looks i guess *any feedback appreciated* and i guess ill take all advice:)

A lot of work and patience if going to have to be put into this mate, remember that this is cluttered with so much dead code and what not, I would recommend fixing up the client unless that’s the silabsoft client, I don’t quite remember to be honest.

Nonetheless, good luck with the development.
